(as of Nov 30,2022 11:53:57 UTC – Details)


Christmas Pathway Lights – Multicolored Light Bulb for Holiday Decorations!
Waterproof Christmas Yard Lights: Christmas stake lights comply with the rain test of UL certification, PVC made, tough for all kinds of weather. These holiday pathway lights are wonderful decorations for home, patio, lawn, bistro, pub, cafe, restaurant, shopping center, supermarket, New Year, birthday, gathering, disco ball party, dinner party, evening party. The AC plug is not waterproof, it should be protected from the rainy day
Replaceable: Turn the yard Christmas lights support on the base and pull out the internal C7 light bulb from the outer jumbo c9 bulb, screw out the damaged bulb from the bulb holder, then screw in a new one gently. And turning off one light will not cause the other lights to go out, which is very user-friendly. These light strings are extremely durable and have an average life of 5,000 hours
Connectable Christmas Walkway Lights: These connectable Christmas outdoor decorations lawn lights are easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere necessary, up to 17 strands connectable to optimize the need for larger area lighting and festival decorations. With the anchor spike plugging in the snowfield, the Christmas pathway lights are definitely the blooming flowers in the winter garden
Product Including: Set of 2 Christmas light sets come with 10 c7 lights bulbs, 10 multicolored jumbo c9 bulbs. Shell colors are orange, red, blue, green, yellow and the has the effect of beautiful when light them up. Christmas light sets come with 2 spare fuse and 4 spare C7 bulbs for easy replacement. Amazing landscape stake lights, perfect for residential, commercial, and holiday decorations

With the VTech IS8121-2 2-Handset Expandable Cordless Phone featuring, Super Long Range, Bluetooth Connect to Cell and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. With up to 2300 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on this cordless phone system lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** SUPER LONE RANGE UP TO 2300 FEET ** Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.
** SMART CALL BLOCKER ** Say goodbye to unwanted calls. Robocalls on your landline are automatically blocked from ever ringing through – even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch on the delicated key on the handset. The call block directory can store up to 1,000 name and number entries.
** BLUETOOTH CONNECT TO CELL ** Make and receive calls from your cellular plan while enjoying the comforts of a home phone. Pair up to 2 cell phones and connect 2 cell phones, or one cell phone and one BLUETOOTH headset for use with landline calls. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** DIGITAL ANSWERING SYSTEM WITH VOICE GUIDE ** This cordless system includes a digital answering machine that has a LED message counter, and records up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements and memos. A built-in voice guide can help you to set up the system easily.
** LARGE 2-INCH SCREEN, BIG TEXT, LIGHTED KEY PAD ** High-contrast text on the extra-large 2 inch screen makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the enlarged font and extra-large and lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions. This feature is especially helpful for those who are visually impaired.
** SPEAKERPHONE and VISUAL RINGER ** This cordless system has built-in a full-duplex speakerphone on handset allowing both ends to speak – and be heard – at the same time for conversations that are more true to life. Also designed with a lighted up visual ringer on top of the handset for noisier environments, or for those with weakened hearing.

Read more

Greater Mobility

Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet of range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.

Smart Call Blocker

Enjoy more peace of mind at home with the Smart Call Blocker, a screening tool built-in the IS8121. With one time set up, the system will carry out your commands automatically.

  • Screen - the system prevents robocalls from interrupting your day by filtering all home calls (from landline) before your phone rings.
  • Approve - avoid unwanted calls by requiring callers (from landline) to identify themselves, allowing you to decide if you want to answer.
  • Star Name List - save callers like friends and family, your trusted organization to the phonebook, so they are always allowed through.

You can also block nuisance callers (from landline or cell-line) on the spot by pressing the Call Block key. Add the intruder's number to the block list so they will be blocked permanently.

Connect to Cell

By connecting your mobile phone with Bluetooth technology, this system allows you to make and receive calls from your cellular plan and landline while enjoying the comforts of a home phone system. It is particularly helpful for those who experiencing signal dead spots at home. By placing the paired cell phone at where it has stronger reception, then use the cordless handsets to make and receive calls. Even if your cell phone is in a different room, you can still place a call, write or read a text, access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Note: Bluetooth wireless technology operates within a short range (approximately 15 feet) from the telephone base. Please keep connected cell phones and headsets within this range for optimum performance.

Virtual 2-Line Phone

This system's Bluetooth Connect to Cell integrates your cell phone for your calls at home, with or without a landline. Compatible with Bluetooth version 2.0 or above devices, you can pair up two cell devices (cell phone or Bluetooth headset), and connect one cell device to be used with landline calls at the same time. Perfect for busy family where one handset can support a landline call while the other handset on a cell-line call. If you are using Android phones (OS 2.3 or higher), you can further extend the flexibility of your telephone system with use of the free Connect To Cell application. VTech Connect to Cell comprises Caller ID manager and Alerts manager that help integrate your cell with your telephone system. Note: for optimal performance of the cordless system, keep the cell device charged and located within 15 feet of the telephone base. Your cell phone’s battery discharges faster while it is connected to the telephone base via Bluetooth wireless technology.

Digitally record up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements, and memos. They system allows for instant playback, selective save or delete, and skipping or repeating messages from the handset and base.

  • 1000 Call Block Directory
  • 1000 Phonebook Directory
  • 50 Caller ID History

2" backlit display and high contrast text makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low light conditions.

Enjoy more true to life conversations with the high quality full-duplex speakerphone built-in on each handset.

Read more

  • Visual Ringer
  • Redial Button
  • Mute Button
  • Quiet Mode

Expandable to 5 handsets using IS8102 accessory handset (sold separately).

Read more

4.5
Price: $69.95 - $45.32
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:58 UTC - Details)

Warranty & Support

Price: $35.99 - $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Givebest has always been keeping itself on edge in same category of household appliance, and committing its users to bring home the best service and products, especially the heaters which sharing us the warmth and hope.

Winning the popular reputation from 600,000+ families worldwide, we will strive to keep polishing our brand and providing affordable and quality products to appreciate our loyal users.

GiveBest Tower Heater

GiveBest Portable Heater

GiveBest Electric Fireplace

2 in 1 heater fan: This ceramic heater provides two heat levels, 1500W or 750W and one cool air fan, you can use it both for winter and summer. Thermostat control of the heater will turn the heater off when it reaches a preset temperature and turn the heater back on when the temperature dips below the thermostat setting
Multi protection safety system: These heaters are made of flame retardant material avoiding any fire hazard. Automatic safety shutoff system will shut the heater off when the heater overheat. The tip over protection system will also shut the heater off when the heater was knocked over by accident and it will come back on automatically if it is up righted
Compact and powerful: 7.9 inch x 6.2 inch x 10.2 inch, 2.9 pounds portable mini heater with build in carry handle helps to reinforce the potential of rather low electrical bills by using at the place where you need when you don’t want to warm the full house with other centralized heaters
Quiet and fast heating: The noise this ceramic heater makes is lower than 45 decibels, quiet enough for most people to use in a bedroom while sleeping. With PTC ceramic heating tech and high speed fan, this heater put out tons of heat to heat up 200 square feet in seconds
Upgrade abs material: Upgrade abs material applied, which is more flame-retardant. The room heater with six feet lead cord and 2 prong connection has a long lasting life

Previous page
Next page

1 Quick Heat 2 Low Noise 3 Safe to Use

Is it a noisy heater?

Everyone's sensitivity to sound is different. The noise level of our heater is 45 dB . A suitable living environment should not exceed 55 dB and should not fall below 15 dB:)

Can I use the heater in the bathroom?

You can use the heater to heat your bathroom, but a heater is an electric appliance, it need to be kept away from water.

Does this heater is efficient and cost-effective?

Yes, this heater is a 1500w heater, so it is very efficient, the heating effect is the same as other heaters, but compared with other heaters, this heater is more cost-effective.

How do I choose a heater? From outlook or safe features or others ?

Absolutely safety first. A heater must have overheat and tip over protection.

I need a heater for my pet. Does this heater release chemicals such as PTFE?

No, our heaters don't release chemicals, it is safe for pets.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:50 UTC – Details)


Tackle your next adventure with the Rightline Gear Range Jr car top and roof rack cargo carrier. Designed for use WITH or WITHOUT a roof rack, you can attach the straps of this roof cargo bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to a vehicle’s door frame weather molding – the only revolutionary solution of its kind that WILL NOT interfere with passenger headroom. Rated Weatherproof +, the Range Jr’s UV-protected PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT shell, urethane-coated zipper, and hook-and-loop-close zipper flap provide a dual barrier from the elements. Featuring 10 cubic feet of rooftop storage, this compact car luggage carrier roof bag allows you to transport your cargo and your passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience. All Rightline Gear products come backed by a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty, so Gear up with confidence!
Car Top Carrier: Our convenient roof cargo carrier allows you to keep your gear up top, so you can transport belongings and passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience
Intuitive Features: Specially designed to keep your gear dry, our waterproof car roof cargo carrier features welded seams, an urethane-coated zipper, and a hook-and-loop-close zipper flap
Quality Construction: Constructed of UV-protected PVC semi-coated mesh, our durable vehicle cargo carriers are designed to keep your belongings dry and won’t fly off your roof
Simple Setup: Simply attach the straps of the roof bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to your vehicle’s door frame weather molding
Seamless Storage: Our rooftop cargo bag folds down for storage in the included stuff sack; Car roof bag, 4 attachment straps, 4 car clips, and stuff sack with sewn-in setup guide included

What makes Rightline Gear Range Car Top Carriers Weatherproof +?

A step up from Rightline Gear’s Ace Car Top Carriers, The Range Carriers add a urethane coated zipper. A zipper flap adds extra protection. All seams of the carrier are welded watertight and Rightline Gear’s proprietary PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT stands up to the elements for years to come. Other carriers may claim to be waterproof or weatherproof, but they do not have the features to back it up.

Read more

Features

Urethane Coated Zipper

The Range Car Top Carriers use Urethane Coated Zippers as the first line of defense against moisture and the elements, while other carriers use standard zippers with exposed teeth that let water in!

PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT

High velocities are no match for Range Car Top Carriers, thanks to their heavy-duty, Xtra Tough PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT construction.

Stuff Sack

All of Rightline Gear’s Range Car Top Carriers come with a handy stuff sack so your carrier is always on hand when you need it, and easily stows away when you don’t.

Read more

Attachment Methods

WITH a Roof Rack

Loop the included straps around the roof rack side rails or cross bars.

WITHOUT a Roof Rack – Car Clips

Start with the Car Clips on the (4) attachment straps. Open the vehicle’s doors and hook the Car Clips under the door frame weather molding.

Read more

Standard Airline Carry-on.

Carrier Fit Guide

To ensure a proper fit, please measure your vehicle’s roof (as shown above) and compare to the carrier’s dimensions.

  • Range Jr: 36” L x 32” W x 15” H
  • Compact Cars to SUVs, minivans
  • Popular Examples: Honda Civic, Toyota Corolla, Ford Focus, Chevy Cruze
  • Will fit larger vehicles as well

Carrier Capacity Guide

Price: $79.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:05:41 UTC – Details)


The holidays are here and ‘tis the season to decorate your home but string lights are a struggle. Hanging lights is really hard work and takes too much time. Untangling them from the box is a pain and going out in the cold high up on a ladder quickly makes your joyous ho-ho-hos turn into bah-humbugs. When one bulb breaks, you need to check them all! Worse yet, during the day, your home’s appearance is ruined by ugly wires everywhere. But not anymore! From the number one laser decorating brand in the world comes the brand-new Star Shower Ultra 9 Laser Light Show, now with an incredible NINE different beautiful decorative light patterns for you to choose from. Star Shower Ultra 9 is the ORIGINAL laser light system that immerses your entire home from top to bottom with a galaxy of THOUSANDS of spectacular red and green lights! And it’s so easy! Just plug it in and turn it on. Your home can transform from dull to dazzling with a magical three-dimensional light field of beautiful crisp bright lights. Better yet, with Star Shower, you can have lights way up high on your house where no string light could ever reach. Star Shower even works on shrubbery and trees – higher than you could ever reach – making your home and yard look more festive than ever! Star Shower Ultra 9 covers up to 3200 square feet. For spectacular results use two or more Star Shower Ultra 9 units!
New 2022 Star Shower Model: From the makers of the best-selling holiday lights projector comes the newest, most innovative way to shower your home indoors and outdoors with thousands of brilliant, shining electric lights to create a winter wonderland of color
Fast, Easy Holiday Decorations: Holiday decorating with string lights is a tangled mess and if one light blows, they all go out; ditch the old holiday decorations with Star Shower Ultra 9 light projector, the fastest, easiest way to project thousands of festive laser lights onto your house
9 Light Patterns: Don’t be stuck with the same holiday decorations for all 25 days of Christmas; Star Shower Ultra 9 has 9 different patterns of holiday lights, so you can pick a new Christmas lights pattern every week or choose your favorite to shower your home through the holidays
3 Color Combinations: The AS SEEN ON TV Star Shower Ultra 9 outdoor lights and indoor lights projector features three different light combinations; choose from red and green lights together, only red, or only green and change color combinations with the press of a button
Still, Motion, or Blinking Laser Lights: Customize your laser light show with still, motion or blinking lights; Try the motion lights setting to enjoy a cascading, moving lights show dancing across your house, or use static mode and fall in love with the magical galaxy of still stars

item.dc:creator: admin

The tear resistance offers ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:55:04 UTC – Details)


Make fast, easy and precise corrections on even the toughest errors with BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape. This tear-resistant, film-based BIC Wite-Out Brand Correction Tape comes in a tape dispenser that offers maximum comfort and control, so you can easily and accurately correct mistakes. The tear resistance offers tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last. The Wite-Out Brand tape requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip, so you can instantly write or type your corrections over it. A translucent body lets you see exactly how much BIC correction tape remains and a self-winding wheel lets you easily rewind the correction tape should it become loose. One pack contains four tape dispensers, each containing 39.3 feet of white correction tape. If you’re looking for reliable office or school supplies for lefties and righties, look no further than this white correction tape. From America’s No. 1 correction brand*, choose BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape for a high-quality, safe and affordable product you can trust. *Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service and Commercial Tracking Service, U.S., based on actual unit sales; 12ME June 2022 combined.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5.25 x 8.13 x 0.75 inches; 3.1 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ WOTAPP418-WHI
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 27, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ BIC Corporation
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0007L1W0E
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Mexico

One 4-count pack of BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape, a tear-resistant, film-based correction tape with a tape dispenser offering maximum comfort and control
Instantly write or type your corrections with this white correction tape, which requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip
Clear correction tape dispenser lets you see exactly how much tape remains and the self-winding wheel lets you rewind the tape if it becomes loose
Each tape dispenser contains 39.3 feet of white correction tape to offer a long-lasting option for school or office supplies
Suitable for righties and lefties, these BIC Wite-Out Brand tapes offer a wide variety of use amongst students and employees for their documents and assignments

Read more

Strong Correction Tape from America’s #1 Correction Brand*

Instant, Tidy Corrections

BIC Wite-Out Brand correction tape applies dry, allowing you to quickly fix mistakes without the mess or waiting time of a correction fluid. Offering greater strength than paper-based tape, this film-based tape is more tear resistant to create tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last.

Easy to Apply

Dispensing the tape is easy: simply position the tip flat on the area to be corrected, press down firmly, and gently move from left to right. If tape becomes loose, press tip of tape firmly on paper, make slow motion towards the right, and repeat until tape rewinds.

Translucent Dispenser

The translucent dispenser allows you to see at a glance how much tape is remaining. You can apply the tape in a controlled, comfortable fashion.

Read more

Product Description

Mileseey 165 Feet Laser Measure

Better Quality and Unceasing Innovation

Mileseey was established in 1998. With over 20 years of manufacturing and R & D experience in the measuring instruments industry, he works on technological innovation, product usability improvements, and the creation of more economical and stable solutions.

Mileseey is Dedicated to Providing You with the Highest Quality Products and Satisfied After-Sales Service.

Higher Accuracy, Higher Efficiency

Two bubble levels provide more precise measurement compared to one bubble; Measuring range up to 165 Ft, remarkable accuracy reach ±1/16 inch; Fast measurement speed improve your work efficieny greatly.

Product Specifications Measuring range: 165ft / 50m Distance measurement precision: ±1/16 inch(±2mm) Units: m/feet/inches Display: 2.0 inche Large LCD Backlit Laser Level/Type: Class II/635nm, <1mW Max storage: 20 units Battery type: 1.5V 2*AAA(Included) Auto laser power-off: 20s / Auto power-off: 150s

Measure Everywhere

Measured directly, by using the pythagorean theorem (a2+b2=c2).

Area Measurement.

S2 can calculate the area of a square or rectangular room or space by measuring its length and width and multiplying the two values.

Quick measurement in 0.5s

There are two photosensitive holes and a large optical lens. During the measurement process, the light transmittance is increased by 50%, and the response time is 0.5s. It can better withstand strong light interference and can still be clearly read under external sunlight Compared with other laser measurement, it provides more stable and accurate measurement.

Conversion of 4 Units

Press and hold the Units button for 2 seconds to freely change the units to M / In / Ft / Ft + in, which can meet your different measurement needs.

Quick and Accurate Measure to Easy Your Life Perfectly

Compact Size with Multiple Functions – Continuous & Pythagoras & Single Distance Measurement.

Based on measured Length, width and height, gets you smart volume and area calculations, no need of manual operation any more.

Waterproof & Dust-proof to Protect tool

Features IP54 waterproof level, can protect the laser distance measure normally to the maximum extent, which offers a variety of environmental work for using.

Small Body fits in hand perfectly, gives you convenient operation; You can put it in your pocket or carry it everywhere.

Warm Tips 1:It is recommended that you avoid direct sunlight. 2:As strong sunlight weakens the laser energy and can affect accuracy and measurement range, measurement is not recommended for outdoor use. 3:This equipment is a class 2 laser product. Be careful not to touch the user’s eyes. 4:If the sun’s diffuse reflection is weak, use a highly reflective tool.

✓

★ HIGH ACCURACY & UNIT SWITCHABLE ★ With unique 2 Bubble Levels, providing more precise measurement compared to one bubble;With laser precision technology, accuracy ups to ±1/16inch, measuring distance extends to 165 feet; Switchable among M/In/Ft for free adjustment
★ LCD BACKLIGHT & MUTE SETTING ★ Large backlight screen provides you with a better visibility in dark areas; Mute setting allows you turn on or off the measure beep at your will, suitable for using in library, classroom and other quite places,the laser level is ideal for home, construction and industries, especially in large areas such as rooms, apartments, buildings, real estates, factories, warehouses, etc
★ MULTIPLE MEASUREMENT FEATURES ★ Area, distance, length, volume, continuous measurement, Pythagorean method-three points; Addition and subtraction; Low battery indication; 20 groups data memory; Manually delete data; Auto shut down after 150s without any operation to save power
★ DURABLE AND HANDY DESIGN ★ IP54 waterproof level and dust-proof function protect the laser distance measure to the maximum extent; Portable size and hard rubber body provide a good grip; Wrist strap lets you hold the meter steady and carry easily
★ WHAT YOU GET ★ Mileseey Laser Measuring Device 165Ft; 1.5V AAA Batteries; User Manual; Hand Strap; Package Box; 12 Months Warranty(Ideal thanksgiving gifts and christmas gifts for family and friends)

Price: $99.04
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:28:17 UTC – Details)


Tackle your next adventure with the Rightline Gear Range 3 car top and roof rack cargo carrier. Designed for use WITH or WITHOUT a roof rack, you can attach the straps of this roof cargo bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to a vehicle’s door frame weather molding – the only revolutionary solution of its kind that WILL NOT interfere with passenger headroom. Rated Weatherproof +, the Range 3’s UV-protected PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT shell, urethane-coated zipper, and hook-and-loop-close zipper flap provide a dual barrier from the elements. Featuring 18 cubic feet of rooftop storage, this car luggage carrier roof bag allows you to transport your cargo and your passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience. All Rightline Gear products come backed by a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty, so Gear up with confidence!
Car Top Carrier: Our convenient roof cargo carrier allows you to keep your gear up top, so you can transport belongings and passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience
Intuitive Features: Specially designed to keep your gear dry, our waterproof car roof cargo carrier features welded seams, an urethane-coated zipper, and a hook-and-loop-close zipper flap
Quality Construction: Constructed of UV-protected PVC semi-coated mesh, our durable vehicle cargo carriers are designed to keep your belongings dry and won’t fly off your roof
Simple Setup: Simply attach the straps of the roof bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to your vehicle’s door frame weather molding
Seamless Storage: Our rooftop cargo bag folds down for storage in the included stuff sack; Car roof bag, 4 attachment straps, 4 car clips, and stuff sack with a sewn-in set up guide included

What makes Rightline Gear Range Car Top Carriers Weatherproof +?

A step up from Rightline Gear’s Ace Car Top Carriers, The Range Carriers add a urethane coated zipper. A zipper flap adds extra protection. All seams of the carrier are welded watertight and Rightline Gear’s proprietary PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT stands up to the elements for years to come. Other carriers may claim to be waterproof or weatherproof, but they do not have the features to back it up.

Read more

Features

Urethane Coated Zipper

The Range Car Top Carriers use Urethane Coated Zippers as the first line of defense against moisture and the elements, while other carriers use standard zippers with exposed teeth that let water in!

PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT

High velocities are no match for Range Car Top Carriers, thanks to their heavy-duty, Xtra Tough PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT construction.

Stuff Sack

All of Rightline Gear’s Range Car Top Carriers come with a handy stuff sack so your carrier is always on hand when you need it, and easily stows away when you don’t.

Read more

Attachment Methods

WITH a Roof Rack

Loop the included straps around the roof rack side rails or cross bars.

WITHOUT a Roof Rack – Car Clips

Start with the Car Clips on the (4) attachment straps. Open the vehicle’s doors and hook the Car Clips under the door frame weather molding.

Read more

Standard Airline Carry-on.

Carrier Fit Guide

To ensure a proper fit, please measure your vehicle’s roof (as shown above) and compare to the carrier’s dimensions.

  • Range 3: 48″ L x 36″ W x 18″ H
  • SUVs and minivans
  • Popular Examples: Ford Explorer, Jeep Grand Cherokee, Honda Pilot, Dodge Grand Caravan

Carrier Capacity Guide

The guide below will give you a general idea of how many suitcases each Rightline Gear Car Top Carrier will hold. The guide references a standard Airline Carry-on Bag (14″ W x 8″ D x 22″ H, 1.43 cu ft).

  • Range 3: 18 cu ft = ~12 Carry-on Bags
  • Sport 3: 18 cu ft = ~12 Carry-on Bags
  • Range 2: 15 cu ft = ~10 Carry-on Bags
  • Sport 2: 15 cu ft = ~10 Carry-on Bags
  • Ace 2: 15 cu ft = ~10 Carry-on Bags
  • Range Jr: 10 cu ft = ~7 Carry-on Bags
  • Sport Jr: 10 cu ft = ~7 Carry-on Bags
  • Ace Jr: 9 cu ft = ~6 Carry-on Bags

Read more
